sourcesContent:
export const AUDIO_CONFIG = {
  SILENCE_THRESHOLD: -50,
  SILENCE_DURATION: 3000,
  CHUNK_INTERVAL: 1000,
  BACKEND_URL: 'http://localhost:5000/upload-audio',
  MIN_DECIBELS: -90,
  MAX_DECIBELS: -10,
  SMOOTHING_TIME_CONSTANT: 0.85,
  AUDIO_FORMAT: 'audio/wav',
  SAMPLE_RATE: 44100,
  BIT_DEPTH: 16,
  CHANNELS: 1,
  WAV_FORMAT: {
    AUDIO_FORMAT: 1, // PCM
    SAMPLE_RATE: 44100,
    BIT_DEPTH: 16,
    CHANNELS: 1
  }
};
